All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CreateEditEventActivity
Activity for creating or editing events within the application.
CreateEditFacilityActivity
Activity to create or edit a facility within the application.
EntEventsRepository
Repository class to handle entrant-related Firestore interactions.
EntEventsRepository.ActionCallback
Callback interface for action results.
EntEventsRepository.EventCallback
Callback interface for loading a single event.
EntEventsRepository.EventListCallback
Callback interface for loading a list of events.
EntrantHomeActivity
Activity to display all events that the entrant has joined.
EntrantHomeTest
Instrumented tests for EntrantHomeActivity.
Event
Represents an Event that entrants can sign up for.
EventDetailsEntrantActivity
Activity to display the details of an event for entrants.
EventDetailsOrganizerActivity
Activity to display the details of an event for organizers.
EventsAdapter
Adapter class for managing and displaying a list of events in a RecyclerView.
EventsAdapter.EventViewHolder
ViewHolder class for holding and recycling event item views.
EventsTest
Unit tests for the Event class.
EventWaitingListActivity
Activity to display the list of entrants on the waiting list for an event with filtering capabilities.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilitiesTest
Unit tests for the Facility model class.
Facility
Represents a Facility where events are hosted.
LandingActivity
Activity that serves as the landing page for the application.
LandingActivityTest
Instrumented UI tests for the LandingActivity.
ManageMediaActivity
Activity for admins to manage media files.
ManageUsersActivity
Activity for admins to manage user profiles.
MediaAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying media (images) in ManageMediaActivity.
MediaAdapter.MediaViewHolder
ViewHolder class for media items.
MediaAdapter.OnMediaClickListener
Interface to handle media item clicks.
MyApplication
 
OrganizerHomeActivity
Activity representing the Organizer's Home screen.
OrganizerHomeTest
Instrumented UI tests for OrganizerHomeActivity.
OrgEventsRepository
Repository class to handle organizer event-related Firestore interactions.
OrgEventsRepository.ActionCallback
Callback interface for action results.
OrgEventsRepository.EventCallback
Callback interface for loading a single event.
OrgEventsRepository.EventListCallback
Callback interface for loading a list of events.
PortraitCaptureActivity
Custom Capture Activity to enforce portrait orientation for QR code scanning.
RandomDrawWorker
Worker class responsible for performing random draws for events.
ToastMatcher
A custom matcher to check for Toast messages in Espresso tests.
User
Represents a user within the Potato1 Events application.
UserAdapter
Adapter class for managing and displaying a list of users in a RecyclerView.
UserData
Represents user data used in the application.
UserInfoActivity
Activity responsible for handling user information, including profile picture selection, uploading images to Firebase Storage, generating default avatars, and saving/updating user data to Firestore.
UserInfoTest
 
UserRepository
Handles user-related data operations with Firebase Firestore.
UserRepository.UserExistsCallback
Callback interface for checking if a user exists.
UsersTest
Unit tests for the User class.
